proverb.data: An idealist(n.空想家，理想主义者) is a person who helps other people to be prosperous(adj.成功的).
proverb.explain: 理想主义者是那些帮助他人获得成就的人。
proverb.a: .ist 后缀通常是某种信仰者，专家，从事某种职业的人，从事某种研究，与某事物有关的人
proverb.b: pragmatist(n.实用主义者) pessimist(n.悲观主义者) communist(n.共产主义者) economist(n.经济学家)

proverb.data: It is one of my sources of happiness never to desire(v.想要 n.欲望) a knowledge of other people's business(n.事情，商业).
proverb.explain: 我的快乐源泉之一就是不去管别人的闲事。

proverb.data: Confidence has nothing to do with what you look like. If you obsess over that, you'll end up being disappointed in yourself all the time.
proverb.explain: 自信与外表无关，如果你沉溺于此，便会一直对自己失望
